spatial_accuracy.notes: Overall layout matches the broad zoning (Kitchen/Living on left, Bedroom top-right, stair zone far-right), but multiple plan-specific geometries and openings do not match. The distinctive angled/indented left exterior wall from the 2D plan is simplified/incorrect in the 3D (E4/E2). Several interior partitions around the bath/closet/utility core appear shifted, changing corridor widths and room shapes (E2). Door locations and swings are not faithfully reproduced (notably around the bedroom/bath core) (E2/E3). Window count/spacing along the long bottom wall does not match the repeated segments shown in the 2D plan (E2), and at least one exterior opening on the left side that reads as a door in the plan is not clearly present as a door in the 3D (E1).

structural_fidelity.notes: Wall thickness is visually consistent in the render, but fidelity to the plan’s structural partitioning is weaker. The closet/storage zone (hatched in plan) and the small utility/laundry zone are not clearly separated or are reinterpreted, altering adjacency and circulation (E1/E2). Some doors appear embedded but their exact wall segments and orientations differ from the plan (E2/E3). No clearly new full rooms are added, but the reconfiguration of the service core effectively hallucinates a different partition layout (E5).

furniture_mapping.notes: Kitchen counters and island placement broadly follow the plan, and the bed placement is directionally consistent. However, the living area furniture arrangement deviates (e.g., added desk/workstation not shown on plan; coffee table/sofa placement not tightly matching the 2D icons) (E5/E2). Some scale/proportion of furniture relative to room widths appears off due to the altered wall geometry (E4).

aesthetic_quality.notes: Isometric camera is acceptable and the scene is visually clear. Not orthographic-accurate to a measured axonometric (minor perspective/foreshortening feel) (E6). Lighting is simple but clean; geometry is mostly crisp with minimal artifacts. Composition is readable, though openings (doors/windows) are not clearly differentiated enough to verify exact placements.

detected_errors.description: Left exterior wall geometry (angled/offset segments visible in 2D) is simplified/incorrect in 3D, distorting the living area boundary.
Exterior door/opening on the left side shown in the 2D plan is not clearly represented as a door in the 3D render.
Window placement/count along the long bottom exterior wall does not match the segmented windows shown in the 2D plan.
Service-core partitions (closet/hatched storage and utility/laundry sub-areas) are shifted or merged, changing corridor/room shapes versus the 2D plan.
Multiple interior doors around the bedroom/bath core have incorrect swing/orientation and/or are not located on the exact wall segments indicated in the 2D plan.
Hallucinated furniture elements not indicated on the 2D plan (notably a desk/workstation and extra decorative items).
Projection/camera is not strictly orthographic-axonometric, reducing fidelity for dimensional verification.
